title: In the night kitchen
brief_description: With a musical score reminiscent of an old Laurel and Hardy movie, Maurice Sendak’s comic fantasy springs to life. Cake baking, bakers dancing and Mickey flying in his plane made of dough will delight children of all ages.
description: With a musical score reminiscent of an old Laurel and Hardy movie, Maurice Sendak’s comic fantasy springs to life. Cake baking, bakers dancing and Mickey flying in his plane made of dough will delight children of all ages.
